thread.title: This Morning's Technical Outlook on Investments Stocks -- Cboe Global Markets, FS Investment, GAMCO Global Gold, and Nuveen

author: cnbc.com
title: This Morning's Technical Outlook on Investments Stocks -- Cboe Global Markets, FS Investment, GAMCO Global Gold, and Nuveen
text:
NEW YORK, March 8, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on CBOE, FSIC, GGN, and NEA which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . Today, WallStEquities.com recalls the recent performance of Cboe Global Markets Inc. (NASDAQ: CBOE), FS Investment Corp. (NYSE: FSIC), GAMCO Global Gold, Natural Resources & Income Trust (NYSE AMER: GGN), and Nuveen AMT-Free Quality Municipal Income Fund (NYSE: NEA). These stocks operate in the Diversified Investments space, which includes companies, such as mutual funds, which usually invest in several asset categories and in different securities within each category. All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below.
www.wallstequities.com/registration
Cboe Global Markets
Chicago, Illinois headquartered Cboe Global Markets Inc.'s shares gained slightly by 0.52%, closing Wednesday's trading session at $118.79. The stock recorded a trading volume of 1.44 million shares. The Company's shares have advanced 52.35% over the past year. The stock is trading 9.77% above its 200-day moving average. Additionally, shares of the Company, which through its subsidiaries, operates as an options exchange in the US, have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 53.57.
On February 13 th , 2018, research firm Deutsche Bank upgraded the Company's stock rating from 'Hold' to 'Buy' while revising its previous target price from $120 a share to $127 a share.
On February 15 th , 2018, Cboe Global Markets announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.27 per share of common stock for the first quarter of 2018. This dividend is payable on March 16 th , 2018, to stockholders of record as of March 02 nd , 2018. Get the full research report on CBOE for free by clicking below at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=CBOE
FS Investment
On Wednesday, shares in FS Investment Corp. recorded a trading volume of 849,405 shares. The stock declined slightly by 0.68%, ending the day at $7.35. The Company's shares have advanced 0.68% in the past month. The stock is trading below its 50-day moving average by 2.00%. Furthermore, shares of FS Investment, which specializing in investments in debt securities, have an RSI of 47.83.
On March 01 st , 2018, FS Investment's Board of Directors has declared a regular cash distribution for Q1 2018 of $0.19 per share, which will be paid on or about April 03 rd , 2018, to stockholders of record as of the close of business on March 21 st , 2018. FSIC's complimentary research coverage is a few simple steps away at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=FSIC
GAMCO Global Gold
US-domiciled GAMCO Global Gold, Natural Resources & Income Trust's stock finished the day 1.00% lower at $4.93 with a total trading volume of 439,394 shares. The stock is trading below their 50-day moving average by 5.59%. Shares of the Company, which invests in the public equity markets across the globe, have an RSI of 33.25.
On February 23 rd , 2018, GAMCO Global's Board of Trustees declared cash distributions of $0.05 per share for each of April, May, and June 2018. The April distribution is payable on April 23 rd , 2018, to common shareholders of record on April 16 th , 2018. The May distribution is payable on May 23 rd , 2018. to common shareholders of record on May 16 th , 2018. The June distribution is payable on June 22 nd , 2018, to common shareholders of record on June 15 th , 2018. Register for your free research report on GGN at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=GGN
Nuveen AMT-Free Quality Municipal Income Fund
Shares in US-domiciled Nuveen AMT-Free Quality Municipal Income Fund ended yesterday's session 0.38% lower at $12.96. The stock recorded a trading volume of 382,181 shares. The Company's shares have advanced 0.47% in the last month. The stock is trading 2.74% below its 50-day moving average. Moreover, shares of Nuveen, which invests in the fixed income markets of the US, have an RSI of 36.49.
On March 06 th , 2018, Nuveen announced corrections to its press release titled, "Nuveen Closed-End Funds Declare Distributions," dated March 01 st , 2018. The Company corrected rounding errors found in the last table of its release, under "Quarterly Distribution Per Share". Wall St. Equities' downloadable research report on NEA available at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=NEA
--

One department produces non-sponsored analyst certified content generally in the form of press releases, articles and reports covering equities listed on NYSE and NASDAQ and the other produces sponsored content (in most cases not reviewed by a registered analyst), which typically consists of compensated investment newsletters, articles and reports covering listed stocks and micro-caps.
